title: Project: Mordekaiser
body:
Wanted to design a skin myself, and I tried to find a champion who hasn't had a new one in a while. So I picked Mordekaiser. I thought, man, he'd look cool with a similar theme as Poject: Yasuo. So thats how this came about, hope you enjoy.

EDIT: I felt like expanding this skin idea to more than just a splash art. This is my first time I've ever drawn something like this though, so it isn't that amazing. Regardless, I hope you like it.

replies.body:
as long as its laugh is a monotone
Hue
Hue
Hue
Hue
Hue
that never ends.
Even after the animation ends.
For the rest of the match,.
And it can be heard by all players
And then even after the game ends
And even after you close the game
And even after you turn off your computer
And even after you turn off the speakers
And even after you leave your room
And even in your bathroom
Right
In
Your
Ear.
im sad that not everyone is gunna get to read this :< 10/10 would laugh again
Thank you, kind sir.
So, I don't understand. Why is this "huehue" thing that was started on a completely different game then League inevitably ended up being stuck onto Morde?

if you explain a joke then its not funny.

Its a joke a veteran will get and be mildly amused.
Like NunuBot?
for some {{champion:105}}ing reason this was hard to read.. it took me like 1 minute or so WTF?!
This is quite impressive visually, and well done for picking a unique mash up of themes on a champ who doesn't get a lot of love these days.
LUTZ HAS SPOKEN!

A Battlecast, Project or Mecha skin on Mordekaiser is an awesome idea. You are very skilled as well thanks for the neat post brosif.

Regards,

Basic
Looks like that thing from Thor...
Holographic effects on Children of the Grave. It makes me want to buy the skin already

... drool

Mordekaiser has such a powerful look, this is but one of dozens of skins he should have!
Pretty cool!  what would the visual effects be for his E and R?
Thanks.  E is his spinning metal one right?  Cause that's those shields are floating around him.
Actually that's his w, the e is that rather hard-to-see cone.
Oh right right.  I haven't played morde in a while lol.
I've been wanting a new Mord skin for the longest time, and this would be absolutely amazing, there could be so many cool things put into this skin, I want it so bad

wow as a mordekaiser main you make me wet. thank you for giving some love to my fav forgotten champ ;_;

{{item:3110}}
I could see him with Sundowner's giant plate shield things
Assuming Project: Yasuo was inspired by Metal Gear Rising,  I designed his helmet loosely on Sundowners helmet and shoulders from Sam's shoulders.
Awesome, but I would really hope they give him a VU before he gets any skins. Dem pizza feet.
Do you have Deviantart or something like that? I would love to follow you
I do, http://torvald2000.deviantart.com/ right there. Glad you like it.

It's just awesome! I like how you make skin concepts for unpopular champions like Mordekaiser, the most concepts i see are for popular champions, which gets stale rather quick, seeing concepts for jinx or riven over and over again.
I'm glad you noticed haha. I've been busy lately but I'm working on another skin idea.
Never play Morde. Would buy skin.
God-speed to this skin!
I don't own Mordekaiser, but this would be one of those skins that tempts you to buy the champion to buy the skin. Very nice!
That's actually really wicked.  Let me just start making it rain on my computer screen and maybe something will happen.
So much Gundam wing HELL YEAH
Unless he rips off his shirt and yells "Nanomachine, son!" I'm not interested.
